λ.intent: Global curvature / mode-deformation operator that bends deviation and semantic flows.

λ\_curv.intent: Pure geometric curvature component of λ.

λ\_mode.intent: Mode-deformation component describing how individual modes are stretched, compressed, or twisted.

λ\_x.intent: Cross-mode interaction term encoding how modes bend each other.

λ\*.intent: Adjoint curvature describing back-reaction of deformed modes on the base geometry.

λ→δ.intent: Map from curvature configuration to induced deviation operator (how curvature generates δ-like shifts).
